name: The Andyland Dating Simulator!
description:
Enter Twitch Academy, the premier school for streamers everywhere- except you. As the only non-streamer in the school, you have to navigate your first day not only juggling classes and keeping your embarrassing secret, but finding love as well! Meet your classmates, Keychain Andy and Mini Meg, along with many other characters, and fall head over heels for them. Will they fall for you too by the end of the day? Will your secret remain uncovered? Are you even paying attention in class? Play the game and find out!

Keychain Andy and Mini Meg are characters based on the real life Andres Guerrero (Andyland) and Meg Oswalt (Meowsalt)- This game was made with their permission and encouragement, and is a gift to the two of them.  Hi, Andy and Meg!
